== Examples

=== Rerank some documents based on a query

Rerank some documents based on a query

[source,yaml]
----
input:
  generate:
    interval: 1s
    mapping: |
      root = {
        "query": fake("sentence"),
        "docs": [fake("paragraph"), fake("paragraph"), fake("paragraph")],
      }
pipeline:
  processors:
  - cohere_rerank:
      model: rerank-v3.5
      api_key: "${COHERE_API_KEY}"
      query: "${!this.query}"
      documents: "root = this.docs"
output:
  stdout: {}
----
